snippet.title: Idol Hands - Trailer
snippet.description:
Out Now! - http://goo.gl/gfGu0u

Idol Hands is a strategy game where you gradually take over the world by guiding your people and defeating other gods.

You are a god in a time of many gods. Rather than having direct control over your people’s actions, placing buildings and micro managing; your people will live their lives for themselves.

Your powers will provide them with usable land, increase the bounty of their harvest, protect them from attack, and tame nature to their benefit.

Without you, your people are directionless.

With your help they can grow and prosper, eventually forming a fighting force that you will unleash upon your enemy’s population to wipe them out, leaving any other god powerless and defeated.

Developed by Pocket Games Inc - http://www.pocketgamesinc.com/
Published by Green Man Loaded - http://www.greenmanloaded.com/
